author: assaf
msg: Fixed section dealing with mailing list, point to archives instead of mailto addresses, also list -commits archive.
Instructions for installing Buildr from source: added setup task and usage for JRuby.
Git: link to Github page and git clone instructions.

author: sebor
msg: allocated (8 + 1) bytes for the longest UTF-8 character rather
than assuming that MB_LEN_MAX is large enough.

author: wrowe
msg: * build/dbm.m4 (APU_CHECK_DBM): Fix gdbm detection to use LDFLAGS
rather than LIBS, and to save/restore both that and CPPFLAGS correctly.
Submitted by: Philip M. Gollucci, jorton
